SELECT a.org_id, b.id, b.notice_title AS noticeTitle, b.pub_plan_start_dt AS startTime, b.notice_cont AS noticeContent, b.title_img_path AS noticeImgPath, b.notice_level_div AS noticeLevDiv, c.reading_sts_div AS readStsDiv FROM (SELECT * FROM mst_notice_deliver WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND stu_id = #{stuId} AND del_flg = 0) a INNER JOIN mst_notice b ON
to_timestamp(b.pub_plan_start_dt::text,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') <= to_timestamp(now()::text,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND to_timestamp(b.pub_plan_end_dt::text,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') >= to_timestamp(now()::text,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
AND b.notice_type_div = '6' AND a.notice_id = b.id --NWT 楊 2021/07/14 MANAMIRU1-690 Edit Start AND b.del_flg = 0 --NWT 楊 2021/07/14 MANAMIRU1-690 Edit End INNER JOIN guard_reading_sts c ON c.guard_id = #{guardId} AND c.stu_id = #{stuId} AND a.guard_id = c.guard_id AND c.notice_id = b.id AND c.del_flg = 0 GROUP BY a.org_id, b.id, b.notice_title, b.pub_plan_start_dt, b.notice_cont, b.title_img_path, b.notice_level_div, c.reading_sts_div ORDER BY c.reading_sts_div, pub_plan_start_dt desc
